sv.purpose: Prognostisk värdering av prostatacancer med hjälp av olika kliniska parametrar.
sv.use:
Maximal poängsumma uppgår till 10p, och baseras på följande parametrar:
Gradering enligt Gleason
PSA-värde vid diagnos
Ålder 
Kliniskt cancerstadium: antingen 1/2 eller 3a
Antal procent positiva biopsier

Rekommenderad åtgärd:
- vid mycket låg risk, överväg rutinmässig kontroll
- vid låg-mellan risk, överväg lokal behandling (kirurgi eller strålning, brachyterapi)
- vid mellan-hög risk, överväg multimodal/kombinerad behandling (kirurgi med strålning, eller strålning och hormonell behandling)
- vid mycket hög risk, överväg antingen multimodal/kombinerad ELLER hormonell behandling, samt kliniska prövningar

en.purpose: The UCSF (University of California, San Francisco CAPRA (CAncer of the Prostate Risk Assessment) Score uses PSA values and Gleason score grades/patterns among other indicators, to help predict prognosis for patients with prostate cancer.
keywords: The UCSF CAPRA score for prostate cancer risk
en.use:
This tool evaluates the risk of Prostate cancer and provides 5 and 10 year survival rates as well as overall recommendations per risk level.

Managment:

- For very low risk patients, consider routine surveillance.
- For low to intermediate-risk patients, consider localized treatment (surgery or radiation alone, brachytherapy with or without external-beam therapy).
- For intermediate to high-risk patients, consider multimodal therapy (surgery with radiation, or radiation therapy with hormonal therapy).
- For very high-risk patients, consider either multimodal therapy OR hormonal therapy, and clinical trial enrollment.


Score interpretation:
                                    Metastasis-free interval              Prostate cancer–specific survival    Overall survival
                                    % likelihood (95% CI) 	                % likelihood (95% CI)                        % likelihood (95% CI)

(≥6 points)
en.misuse: Do not use for diagnostic purposes without also considering a thorough clinical investigation.

gt0001.description: Utvärdering av poäng erhållen i enlighet med USCF CAPRA, en metod för prognostisk värdering av utfall bland patienter som genomgått behandling för prostatacancer.
The UCSF CAPRA score for prostate cancer risk provides an outcome prediction for patients with prostate cancer, post treatment

gt0006.description: Sum of the individual scores. The score range is 0 to 10

gt0034.description: As the managment of prostate cancer patients is dependant on finer grained categories of risk levels, these have been assigned by splitting Very low risk and Low risk with scores of 0 and 1-2 respectively. For High and Very High risk, the scores are 6-8 and > 8 respectively.
